SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw.wordreplacer

Class WordReplacerAbstract

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.wordreplacer.WordReplacerAbstract
Direct Known Subclasses:
WordReplacer
public abstract class WordReplacerAbstract extends Object
An abstract class for replacing words in a text string based on word embeddings and a replacement word set. It supports various similarity algorithms and replacement methods.

    • WordReplacerAbstract

      public WordReplacerAbstract()

  • Method Details

    • replaceStringIfNotInReplacementSet

      protected String replaceStringIfNotInReplacementSet(String string)
      Replaces a word in the string if it is not present in the replacement set. The replacement is based on the similarity score of the word embeddings using the configured similarity algorithm and replacement method.
      Parameters:
      string - the word to be replaced
      Returns:
      the replaced word, or the original word if no replacement is found

    • writeReplacedFile

      public void writeReplacedFile(String inputTextFileName, String outputTextFileName) throws IOException
      Reads the input text file and writes the modified version (with word replacements) to an output file.
      Parameters:
      inputTextFileName - the input text file to read
      outputTextFileName - the output text file to write the replaced content
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading or writing files

    • isWordEmbeddingMapNull

      public boolean isWordEmbeddingMapNull()
      Checks if the word embedding map is null.
      Returns:
      true if the word embedding map is null, false otherwise

    • isReplacementWordSetNull

      public boolean isReplacementWordSetNull()
      Checks if the replacement word set is null.
      Returns:
      true if the replacement word set is null, false otherwise

    • setWordEmbeddingsMap

      public void setWordEmbeddingsMap(WordEmbeddingMapInterface wordEmbeddingMap) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the word embeddings map to be used by the word replacer.
      Parameters:
      wordEmbeddingMap - the word embedding map
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the word embedding map is null

    • setReplacementWordsSet

      public void setReplacementWordsSet(ReplacementWordSetInterface replacementWordSet)
      Sets the replacement word set to be used by the word replacer.
      Parameters:
      replacementWordSet - the replacement word set

      public void setSimilarReplacementWords(int similarReplacementWords)

    • replaceString

      public abstract String replaceString(String string)
      An abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to replace a word in a string.
      Parameters:
